verses.verse: וְיַעֲקֹ֖ב <WH3290> And Jacob הָלַ֣ךְ <WH1980> went לְדַרְכּ֑וֹ <WH1870> on his way וַיִּפְגְּעוּ־ <WH6293> met ב֖וֹ מַלְאֲכֵ֥י <WH4397> and the angels אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> of God

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> he said יַעֲקֹב֙ <WH3290> And when Jacob כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> he רָאָ֔ם <WH7200> saw them מַחֲנֵ֥ה <WH4264> host אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> This [is] God's זֶ֑ה <WH2088> This וַיִּקְרָ֛א <WH7121> and he called שֵֽׁם־ <WH8034> the name הַמָּק֥וֹם <WH4725> of that place הַה֖וּא <WH1931> he מַֽחֲנָֽיִם׃ <WH4266> Mahanaim פ

וַיִּשְׁלַ֨ח <WH7971> sent יַעֲקֹ֤ב <WH3290> And Jacob מַלְאָכִים֙ <WH4397> messengers לְפָנָ֔יו <WH6440> before him אֶל־ <WH413> about עֵשָׂ֖ו <WH6215> to Esau אָחִ֑יו <WH251> his brother אַ֥רְצָה <WH776> unto the land שֵׂעִ֖יר <WH8165> of Seir שְׂדֵ֥ה <WH7704> the country אֱדֽוֹם׃ <WH123> of Edom

וַיְצַ֤ו <WH6680> And he commanded אֹתָם֙ <WH853> לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> them saying כֹּ֣ה <WH3541> Thus תֹאמְר֔וּן <WH559> Thus shall ye speak לַֽאדֹנִ֖י <WH113> unto my lord לְעֵשָׂ֑ו <WH6215> Esau כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> saith עַבְדְּךָ֣ <WH5650> Thy servant יַעֲקֹ֔ב <WH3290> Jacob עִם־ <WH5973> with לָבָ֣ן <WH3837> with Laban גַּ֔רְתִּי <WH1481> thus I have sojourned וָאֵחַ֖ר <WH309> and stayed there עַד־ <WH5704> until עָֽתָּה׃ <WH6258> now

וַֽיְהִי־ <WH1961> have לִי֙ שׁ֣וֹר <WH7794> And I have oxen וַחֲמ֔וֹר <WH2543> and asses צֹ֖אן <WH6629> flocks וְעֶ֣בֶד <WH5650> and menservants וְשִׁפְחָ֑ה <WH8198> and womenservants וָֽאֶשְׁלְחָה֙ <WH7971> and I have sent לְהַגִּ֣יד <WH5046> to tell לַֽאדֹנִ֔י <WH113> my lord לִמְצֹא־ <WH4672> that I may find חֵ֖ן <WH2580> grace בְּעֵינֶֽיךָ׃ <WH5869> in thy sight

וַיָּשֻׁ֙בוּ֙ <WH7725> returned הַמַּלְאָכִ֔ים <WH4397> And the messengers אֶֽל־ <WH413> to יַעֲקֹ֖ב <WH3290> to Jacob לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying בָּ֤אנוּ <WH935> We came אֶל־ <WH413> to אָחִ֙יךָ֙ <WH251> to thy brother אֶל־ <WH413> about עֵשָׂ֔ו <WH6215> Esau וְגַם֙ <WH1571> and furthermore הֹלֵ֣ךְ <WH1980> and also he cometh לִקְרָֽאתְךָ֔ <WH7125> to meet thee וְאַרְבַּע־ <WH702> and four מֵא֥וֹת <WH3967> and four hundred אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> men עִמּֽוֹ׃ <WH5973> with

וַיִּירָ֧א <WH3372> afraid יַעֲקֹ֛ב <WH3290> Then Jacob מְאֹ֖ד <WH3966> was greatly וַיֵּ֣צֶר <WH3334> and distressed ל֑וֹ וַיַּ֜חַץ <WH2673> and he divided אֶת־ <WH853> הָעָ֣ם <WH5971> the people אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who אִתּ֗וֹ <WH854> for וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַצֹּ֧אן <WH6629> that [was] with him and the flocks וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַבָּקָ֛ר <WH1241> and herds וְהַגְּמַלִּ֖ים <WH1581> and the camels לִשְׁנֵ֥י <WH8147> into two מַחֲנֽוֹת׃ <WH4264> bands

וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> And said אִם־ <WH518> If יָב֥וֹא <WH935> come עֵשָׂ֛ו <WH6215> If Esau אֶל־ <WH413> about הַמַּחֲנֶ֥ה <WH4264> company הָאַחַ֖ת <WH259> to the one וְהִכָּ֑הוּ <WH5221> and smite it וְהָיָ֛ה <WH1961> then הַמַּחֲנֶ֥ה <WH4264> then the other company הַנִּשְׁאָ֖ר <WH7604> which is left לִפְלֵיטָֽה׃ <WH6413> shall escape

וַיֹּאמֶר֮ <WH559> said יַעֲקֹב֒ <WH3290> And Jacob אֱלֹהֵי֙ <WH430> O God אָבִ֣י <WH1> of my father אַבְרָהָ֔ם <WH85> Abraham וֵאלֹהֵ֖י <WH430> and God אָבִ֣י <WH1> of my father יִצְחָ֑ק <WH3327> Isaac יְהוָ֞ה <WH3068> the LORD הָאֹמֵ֣ר <WH559> which saidst אֵלַ֗י <WH413> to me שׁ֧וּב <WH7725> unto me Return לְאַרְצְךָ֛ <WH776> unto thy country וּלְמוֹלַדְתְּךָ֖ <WH4138> and to thy kindred וְאֵיטִ֥יבָה <WH3190> and I will deal well עִמָּֽךְ׃ <WH5973> with

קָטֹ֜נְתִּי <WH6994> I am not worthy of the least מִכֹּ֤ל <WH3605> of all הַחֲסָדִים֙ <WH2617> of all the mercies וּמִכָּל־ <WH3605> all הָ֣אֱמֶ֔ת <WH571> and of all the truth אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which עָשִׂ֖יתָ <WH6213> which thou hast shewed אֶת־ <WH853> עַבְדֶּ֑ךָ <WH5650> unto thy servant כִּ֣י <WH3588> with בְמַקְלִ֗י <WH4731> for with my staff עָבַ֙רְתִּי֙ <WH5674> I passed over אֶת־ <WH853> הַיַּרְדֵּ֣ן <WH3383> this Jordan הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> this וְעַתָּ֥ה <WH6258> and now הָיִ֖יתִי <WH1961> have become לִשְׁנֵ֥י <WH8147> and now I am become two מַחֲנֽוֹת׃ <WH4264> bands

הַצִּילֵ֥נִי <WH5337> Deliver me נָ֛א <WH4994> pray מִיַּ֥ד <WH3027> I pray thee from the hand אָחִ֖י <WH251> of my brother מִיַּ֣ד <WH3027> from the hand עֵשָׂ֑ו <WH6215> of Esau כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for יָרֵ֤א <WH3373> for I fear אָנֹכִי֙ <WH595> I אֹת֔וֹ <WH853> פֶּן־ <WH6435> he יָב֣וֹא <WH935> him lest he will come וְהִכַּ֔נִי <WH5221> and smite me אֵ֖ם <WH517> [and] the mother עַל־ <WH5921> with בָּנִֽים׃ <WH1121> the children

וְאַתָּ֣ה <WH859> You אָמַ֔רְתָּ <WH559> And thou saidst הֵיטֵ֥ב <WH3190> I will surely אֵיטִ֖יב <WH3190> do thee good עִמָּ֑ךְ <WH5973> you וְשַׂמְתִּ֤י <WH7760> and make אֶֽת־ <WH853> זַרְעֲךָ֙ <WH2233> thy seed כְּח֣וֹל <WH2344> as the sand הַיָּ֔ם <WH3220> of the sea אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which לֹא־ <WH3808> not יִסָּפֵ֖ר <WH5608> which cannot be numbered מֵרֹֽב׃ <WH7230> for multitude

וַיָּ֥לֶן <WH3885> And he lodged שָׁ֖ם <WH8033> there בַּלַּ֣יְלָה <WH3915> there that same night הַה֑וּא <WH1931> he וַיִּקַּ֞ח <WH3947> and took מִן־ <WH4480> at הַבָּ֧א <WH935> of that which came בְיָד֛וֹ <WH3027> to his hand מִנְחָ֖ה <WH4503> a present לְעֵשָׂ֥ו <WH6215> for Esau אָחִֽיו׃ <WH251> his brother

עִזִּ֣ים <WH5795> she goats מָאתַ֔יִם <WH3967> Two hundred וּתְיָשִׁ֖ים <WH8495> he goats עֶשְׂרִ֑ים <WH6242> and twenty רְחֵלִ֥ים <WH7353> ewes מָאתַ֖יִם <WH3967> two hundred וְאֵילִ֥ים <WH352> rams עֶשְׂרִֽים׃ <WH6242> and twenty

גְּמַלִּ֧ים <WH1581> camels מֵינִיק֛וֹת <WH3243> milch וּבְנֵיהֶ֖ם <WH1121> with their colts שְׁלֹשִׁ֑ים <WH7970> Thirty פָּר֤וֹת <WH6510> kine אַרְבָּעִים֙ <WH705> forty וּפָרִ֣ים <WH6499> bulls עֲשָׂרָ֔ה <WH6235> and ten אֲתֹנֹ֣ת <WH860> she asses עֶשְׂרִ֔ים <WH6242> twenty וַעְיָרִ֖ם <WH5895> foals עֲשָׂרָֽה׃ <WH6235> and ten

וַיִּתֵּן֙ <WH5414> And he delivered בְּיַד־ <WH3027> [them] into the hand עֲבָדָ֔יו <WH5650> of his servants עֵ֥דֶר <WH5739> every drove עֵ֖דֶר <WH5739> drove לְבַדּ֑וֹ <WH905> itself וַ֤יֹּאמֶר <WH559> by themselves and said אֶל־ <WH413> to his עֲבָדָיו֙ <WH5650> unto his servants עִבְר֣וּ <WH5674> Pass over לְפָנַ֔י <WH6440> before me וְרֶ֣וַח <WH7305> a space תָּשִׂ֔ימוּ <WH7760> and put בֵּ֥ין <WH996> betwixt עֵ֖דֶר <WH5739> drove וּבֵ֥ין <WH996> and עֵֽדֶר׃ <WH5739> every

וַיְצַ֥ו <WH6680> And he commanded אֶת־ <WH853> הָרִאשׁ֖וֹן <WH7223> the foremost לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying כִּ֣י <WH3588> When יִֽפְגָּשְׁךָ֞ <WH6298> meeteth thee עֵשָׂ֣ו <WH6215> When Esau אָחִ֗י <WH251> my brother וִשְׁאֵֽלְךָ֙ <WH7592> and asketh thee לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying לְמִי־ <WH4310> to whom אַ֙תָּה֙ <WH859> you וְאָ֣נָה <WH575> and where תֵלֵ֔ךְ <WH1980> going וּלְמִ֖י <WH4310> whom אֵ֥לֶּה <WH428> these לְפָנֶֽיךָ׃ <WH6440> thou? and whose [are] these before

וְאָֽמַרְתָּ֙ <WH559> Then thou shalt say לְעַבְדְּךָ֣ <WH5650> [They be] thy servant לְיַעֲקֹ֔ב <WH3290> Jacob's מִנְחָ֥ה <WH4503> it [is] a present הִוא֙ <WH1931> he שְׁלוּחָ֔ה <WH7971> sent לַֽאדֹנִ֖י <WH113> unto my lord לְעֵשָׂ֑ו <WH6215> Esau וְהִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> and behold גַם־ <WH1571> also ה֖וּא <WH1931> he אַחֲרֵֽינוּ׃ <WH310> and behold also he [is] behind us

וַיְצַ֞ו <WH6680> commanded he גַּ֣ם <WH1571> And so אֶת־ <WH853> הַשֵּׁנִ֗י <WH8145> the second גַּ֚ם <WH1571> also אֶת־ <WH853> הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֔י <WH7992> and the third גַּ֚ם <WH1571> also אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all הַהֹ֣לְכִ֔ים <WH1980> along אַחֲרֵ֥י <WH310> after that הָעֲדָרִ֖ים <WH5739> the droves לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying כַּדָּבָ֤ר <WH1697> On this manner הַזֶּה֙ <WH2088> this תְּדַבְּר֣וּן <WH1696> shall ye speak אֶל־ <WH413> to עֵשָׂ֔ו <WH6215> unto Esau בְּמֹצַאֲכֶ֖ם <WH4672> when ye find אֹתֽוֹ׃ <WH853>

וַאֲמַרְתֶּ֕ם <WH559> And say ye גַּ֗ם <WH1571> moreover הִנֵּ֛ה <WH2009> Behold עַבְדְּךָ֥ <WH5650> Behold thy servant יַעֲקֹ֖ב <WH3290> Jacob אַחֲרֵ֑ינוּ <WH310> [is] behind us כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אָמַ֞ר <WH559> For he said אֲכַפְּרָ֣ה <WH3722> I will appease פָנָ֗יו <WH6440> him בַּמִּנְחָה֙ <WH4503> with the present הַהֹלֶ֣כֶת <WH1980> that goeth לְפָנָ֔י <WH6440> before me וְאַחֲרֵי־ <WH310> and afterward כֵן֙ <WH3651> after that אֶרְאֶ֣ה <WH7200> I will see פָנָ֔יו <WH6440> his face אוּלַ֖י <WH194> perhaps יִשָּׂ֥א <WH5375> peradventure he will accept פָנָֽי׃ <WH6440> of me

וַתַּעֲבֹ֥ר <WH5674> over הַמִּנְחָ֖ה <WH4503> the present עַל־ <WH5921> before פָּנָ֑יו <WH6440> before him וְה֛וּא <WH1931> himself לָ֥ן <WH3885> and himself lodged בַּלַּֽיְלָה־ <WH3915> that night הַה֖וּא <WH1931> himself בַּֽמַּחֲנֶֽה׃ <WH4264> in the company

וַיָּ֣קָם ׀ <WH6965> And he rose up בַּלַּ֣יְלָה <WH3915> that night ה֗וּא <WH1931> same וַיִּקַּ֞ח <WH3947> and took אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁתֵּ֤י <WH8147> his two נָשָׁיו֙ <WH802> wives וְאֶת־ <WH853> שְׁתֵּ֣י <WH8147> and his two שִׁפְחֹתָ֔יו <WH8198> womenservants וְאֶת־ <WH853> אַחַ֥ד <WH259> a עָשָׂ֖ר <WH6240> ten יְלָדָ֑יו <WH3206> sons וַֽיַּעֲבֹ֔ר <WH5674> and passed over אֵ֖ת <WH853> מַעֲבַ֥ר <WH4569> the ford יַבֹּֽק׃ <WH2999> Jabbok

וַיִּקָּחֵ֔ם <WH3947> And he took them וַיַּֽעֲבִרֵ֖ם <WH5674> and sent them over אֶת־ <WH853> הַנָּ֑חַל <WH5158> the brook וַֽיַּעֲבֵ֖ר <WH5674> and sent over אֶת־ <WH853> אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> whatever לוֹ׃

וַיִּוָּתֵ֥ר <WH3498> was left יַעֲקֹ֖ב <WH3290> And Jacob לְבַדּ֑וֹ <WH905> alone וַיֵּאָבֵ֥ק <WH79> alone and there wrestled אִישׁ֙ <WH582> another עִמּ֔וֹ <WH5973> with עַ֖ד <WH5704> until עֲל֥וֹת <WH5927> with him until the breaking הַשָּֽׁחַר׃ <WH7837> of the day

וַיַּ֗רְא <WH7200> And when he saw כִּ֣י <WH3588> for לֹ֤א <WH3808> had not יָכֹל֙ <WH3201> that he prevailed ל֔וֹ וַיִּגַּ֖ע <WH5060> not against him he touched בְּכַף־ <WH3709> and the hollow יְרֵכ֑וֹ <WH3409> the hollow of his thigh וַתֵּ֙קַע֙ <WH3363> was out of joint כַּף־ <WH3709> the socket יֶ֣רֶךְ <WH3409> thigh יַעֲקֹ֔ב <WH3290> of Jacob's בְּהֵֽאָבְק֖וֹ <WH79> as he wrestled עִמּֽוֹ׃ <WH5973> with

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> And he said שַׁלְּחֵ֔נִי <WH7971> Let me go כִּ֥י <WH3588> for עָלָ֖ה <WH5927> breaketh הַשָּׁ֑חַר <WH7837> for the day וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> And he said לֹ֣א <WH3808> not אֲשַֽׁלֵּחֲךָ֔ <WH7971> I will not let thee go כִּ֖י <WH3588> for אִם־ <WH518> except בֵּרַכְתָּֽנִי׃ <WH1288> thou bless
וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> And he said אֵלָ֖יו <WH413> to him מַה־ <WH4100> What שְּׁמֶ֑ךָ <WH8034> he וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> said יַעֲקֹֽב׃ <WH3290> Jacob

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> And he said לֹ֤א <WH3808> shall no יַעֲקֹב֙ <WH3290> no more Jacob יֵאָמֵ֥ר <WH559> shall be called עוֹד֙ <WH5750> longer שִׁמְךָ֔ <WH8034> Thy name כִּ֖י <WH3588> for אִם־ <WH518> but יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> but Israel כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for שָׂרִ֧יתָ <WH8280> for as a prince hast thou power עִם־ <WH5973> with אֱלֹהִ֛ים <WH430> with God וְעִם־ <WH5973> and with אֲנָשִׁ֖ים <WH376> men וַתּוּכָֽל׃ <WH3201> and hast prevailed

וַיִּשְׁאַ֣ל <WH7592> asked יַעֲקֹ֗ב <WH3290> And Jacob וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> [him] and said הַגִּֽידָה־ <WH5046> Tell נָּ֣א <WH4994> Please שְׁמֶ֔ךָ <WH8034> [me] I pray thee thy name וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> And he said לָ֥מָּה <WH4100> Why זֶּ֖ה <WH2088> Wherefore [is] it תִּשְׁאַ֣ל <WH7592> [that] thou dost ask לִשְׁמִ֑י <WH8034> your name וַיְבָ֥רֶךְ <WH1288> abundantly אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> שָֽׁם׃ <WH8033> there

וַיִּקְרָ֧א <WH7121> called יַעֲקֹ֛ב <WH3290> And Jacob שֵׁ֥ם <WH8034> the name הַמָּק֖וֹם <WH4725> of the place פְּנִיאֵ֑ל <WH6439> Peniel כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for רָאִ֤יתִי <WH7200> for I have seen אֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> God פָּנִ֣ים <WH6440> face אֶל־ <WH413> to פָּנִ֔ים <WH6440> to face וַתִּנָּצֵ֖ל <WH5337> is preserved נַפְשִֽׁי׃ <WH5315> and my life

וַיִּֽזְרַֽח־ <WH2224> rose ל֣וֹ הַשֶּׁ֔מֶשׁ <WH8121> the sun כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> he עָבַ֖ר <WH5674> And as he passed over אֶת־ <WH853> פְּנוּאֵ֑ל <WH6439> Penuel וְה֥וּא <WH1931> and he צֹלֵ֖עַ <WH6760> upon him and he halted עַל־ <WH5921> on יְרֵכֽוֹ׃ <WH3409> upon his thigh

עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּ֡ן <WH3651> after that לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not יֹאכְל֨וּ <WH398> eat בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> Therefore the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <WH3478> of Israel אֶת־ <WH853> גִּ֣יד <WH1517> not [of] the sinew הַנָּשֶׁ֗ה <WH5384> which shrank אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> which עַל־ <WH5921> is on כַּ֣ף <WH3709> which [is] upon the hollow הַיָּרֵ֔ךְ <WH3409> of the thigh עַ֖ד <WH5704> against הַיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> unto this day הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> to this כִּ֤י <WH3588> because נָגַע֙ <WH5060> because he touched בְּכַף־ <WH3709> the hollow יֶ֣רֶךְ <WH3409> thigh יַעֲקֹ֔ב <WH3290> of Jacob's בְּגִ֖יד <WH1517> in the sinew הַנָּשֶֽׁה׃ <WH5384> that shrank
